title: Himi 462
lyrics:
8.8.8.8.8.8.
(Koe Saame 84)
1.
Kumi ‘Otua he vale ē,
Fakalauloto mo pehē,
‘Oku ‘ikai pē te u ‘iloa.
Ka ko tangata lotu ē
‘Oku kalanga, “’Oiseuk
e
!
Koe fu’u la’
ā
pe ‘a Sihov
a
.”
2.
‘O hangē ko e hā ‘a e la’ā,
Fonu ‘a e Iangi ‘ene maama,
Puli fetu’u kotoa pē;
‘Oku pehē ‘a e ulo mai,
‘A Sīsū hoku ‘atamai,
Ko hoku maama’anga ē.
3.
Lanu mo’ui ‘a e ‘akau,
Ngaūe matangi mo
e
peau,
He me’a kotoa pē ‘o natul
a
,
Hono tefito ko e la’
ā
,
Talunga ‘ene fua hā
‘I he fekau pē ‘a e ‘Otua.
4.
Ko Sīsū kuo u maama ai,
Māfana hoku ‘atamai,
Mo’ui hoku laumāli
e
;
Ko
e
fakamolemole hia,
He ‘amanaki kolōlia,
Ko ‘ene ngāue fulipē
5.
Kītaki, hoku Iaumālie,
Te ne ‘omai kelesi pē.
Te ne fai hoku taukapo’
i
;
Ko hoku la’
ā
ta’epale ia.
‘E ‘ikai ‘ilo ha masiv
a
,
‘E ‘aku ‘a e Ielei mo’on
i
.*
